code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import TransactionsList from"./TransactionsList";import Search from"./Search";import AddTransactionForm from"./AddTransactionForm";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AccountContainer(){const[transactionsEvent,setTransactionsEvent]=useState([]);const[searchEvent,setSearchEvent]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetch("https://bank-of-flatiron-m53s.onrender.com/transactions").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setTransactionsEvent(data));},[]);function updatedTransactionEvents(addedTransactions){const updatedTransactionEventsArray=[...transactionsEvent,addedTransactions];setTransactionsEvent(updatedTransactionEventsArray);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{searchEvent:searchEvent,setSearchEvent:setSearchEvent}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddTransactionForm,{addedData:updatedTransactionEvents}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionsList,{transactionsEvent:transactionsEvent,setTransactionsEvent:setTransactionsEvent,searchEvent:searchEvent})]});}export default AccountContainer;
